tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek her şeyin başında gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Elias Canetti

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllı insan, istediği şeyi, orta karar insan da başkalarının istediği şeyleri öğrenir.
tr_quotes.author: George Moore

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeye ait her şeyi öğrenin, her şeye dair bir şeyler bilin.
tr_quotes.author: H. Van Dyke

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer öğrenmek bir kazanımsa, demek ki insan kaybederken de kazanıyordu
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel konuşmak için tek bir yol vardır, dinlemeyi öğrenmek
tr_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünmeden öğrenmek, zamanı kaybetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Size kimin hükmettiğini öğrenmek istiyorsunuz, sadece kimi eleştirme izniniz olmadığını bulun.
tr_quotes.author: Espinasse

tr_quotes.quote: Lüzumsuz şeyler öğrenenler, lüzumlu şeylere kulak tıkamış olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

tr_quotes.quote: Ama öğrenmek kolay değildir, bir kaplumbağa gibi sabırlı, başı göklere değen yalçın kayaları un ufak eden rüzgar kadar inatçı olmalısın.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Ümit

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşayarak öğrenmek, bedeli en yüksek öğrenme biçimidir.
tr_quotes.author: Napolyon

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyaya yaşama sevgisi ile baktığımızda, dünya bize güzelliklerini gösterecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Diğer insanlardaki en iyiyi keşfetmeyi araştırdığımızda, bir şekilde kendi içimizdeki en iyiyi ortaya çıkarırız.
tr_quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

tr_quotes.quote: Çok öğrenmek isteyen kişinin, çok acı çekmesi gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Sevgiye kusursuz insanı bularak değil, kusurlu insanı kusursuz olarak görmeyi öğrenerek ulaşırız.
tr_quotes.author: Sam Keen

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybettiğinizde aldığınız dersi de kaybetmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyi öğrenmek için, her şeyden önce onu sevmek gerekir
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Deneyimi akıllıca kullandığınız sürece hiçbir şey zaman kaybı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Rodin

tr_quotes.quote: Uğraşmış olmak, çaba göstermiş olmak, belirli ideallere sadık olmuş olmak. Sadece bu bile tek başına mücadeleye değer.
tr_quotes.author: William Penn

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenme sanatının unsurları: İrade, intizam ve zamandır.
tr_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek istersen iyiyle fenayı, seyreyle bir kenardan yalan dünyayı
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Her alanda, yalnız sevdiğimiz kimseden öğrenebiliriz.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Unutmayın ki, öğrenmek ve yapmamak, aslında öğrenmemektir. Bilmek ve yapmamak, aslında bilmemektir.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

tr_quotes.quote: Başınıza olumsuz bir şey geldiğinde, içinde saklı derin bir ders vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Doğru yönde bakıyorsak, yapmamız gereken tek şey yürümeye devam etmektir
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Büyüklüğün kati kanıtı, eleştiriye gücenmeden katlanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Hareketlerimiz, sözlerimiz ve düşüncelerimiz sayesinde bir seçim sahibi olduğumuzu asla unutmamalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

tr_quotes.quote: Kendisinden bir şey öğrenilmeyecek, tek bir insana rastlamadım.
tr_quotes.author: Alain

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece sıkı sıkıya tuttuğun şeyleri kaybedersin.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek istiyorsan eğer; bildiğin zaman bildiğini anla, bilmediğin zaman ise bilmediğini.
tr_quotes.author: Konfüçyüs

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek için çok çalış, bilgi insanın daha zekice ve tesirlice çalışmasını sağlar.
tr_quotes.author: Charles Schwab

tr_quotes.quote: Önce kendi gideceğin yolu öğren, sonra öğretmeye kalk.
tr_quotes.author: Budha

tr_quotes.quote: Değişmeyen tek şey değişimin kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Heraclitus

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızca kültürlü insanlar öğrenmeyi sever, cahiller ders vermeyi tercih eder.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Senin varlığından dolayı bir tek hayatın bile daha kolay nefes almış olduğunu bilmek, bu başarmış olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

tr_quotes.quote: Zevkle öğrendiğimizi, hiçbir zaman unutamayız.
tr_quotes.author: Alfred Mercier

tr_quotes.quote: Tünelin sonundaki ışık illüzyon değildir. Tünelin kendisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Her yeni gün hayatınızı değiştirmek için ayrı bir fırsattır
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmenin sınırlarını genellikle kendiniz koyarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Colinros

tr_quotes.quote: Açık zihinler açık kapılara sebep olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eylemsiz vizyon bir hayaldir. Vizyonsuz eylem bir kabustur.
tr_quotes.author: Japon Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmenin sonsuzluğu, insana ne kadar az bildiğini gösterir.
tr_quotes.author: Edward Young

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenmek akıntıya karşı yüzmek gibidir. İlerleyemediğiniz takdirde gerilersiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Güzel yolculuk etmek varmaktan daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Birçok şeyi orta derecede öğrenmektense, az şeyi tam öğrenmek daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Maurois

tr_quotes.quote: Dünden öğren, bugünü yaşa, yarın için umut et.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Öğretmek, olanaklı olanı göstermektir yalnızca.Öğrenmekse onu kendin için olanaklı kılmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek akıl çok öğrenmekle elde edilmez, bilge istifçilik yapmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek mutluluk, hayal kırıklıklarından ders almayı öğrenmekte gizlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

tr_quotes.quote: Akıllar paraşütler gibidir. Sadece açıldığında iş görürler.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Dewar

tr_quotes.quote: Düşüncelerinizden sadece siz sorumlu olduğunuzdan, onları sadece siz değiştirebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

tr_quotes.quote: İmkansızlıklar, yalnızca henüz öğrenmediğimiz şeylerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Charles W. Chestnutt

tr_quotes.quote: On yaşında bilginler gibi konuşacaklarına, altmış yaşında öğrenci gibi kalsınlar. Bilgisizlikten kurtulmak isteyenin, onu açığa vurması gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Montaigne

tr_quotes.quote: İmkansızlıklar sadece, henüz öğrenmediğimiz şeylerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Charles W. Chestnutt

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey bize bilmemiz gerekenleri öğretene kadar bir yere gitmezler.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Size olan her şey sizin öğretmeninizdir. İşin sırrı, kendi hayatınızın yamacına oturmayı ve ondan ders almayı öğrenmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Polly Berrien Berends

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is never given; it is won
en_quotes.author: A. Philip Randolph

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: We believe in freedom, freedom for the people of each country to follow their destiny without external interference
en_quotes.author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

en_quotes.quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams
en_quotes.author: Madonna Ciccone

en_quotes.quote: The rainbow flag is a symbol of freedom and liberation that we made for ourselves
en_quotes.author: Gilbert Baker

en_quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom
en_quotes.author: George Washington Carver

en_quotes.quote: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds!
en_quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

en_quotes.quote: Necessity is blind until it becomes conscious. Freedom is the consciousness of necessity
en_quotes.author: Karl Marx

en_quotes.quote: It is difficult to free fools from the chains they revere
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Those who profess to favor freedom, and yet deprecate agitation, are men who want crops without plowing up the ground
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: Struggle is a never ending process. Freedom is never really won, you earn it and win it in every generation
en_quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

en_quotes.quote: I have freedom. But freedom means total selfishness. It means nobody cares much what you do
en_quotes.author: Lynn Barber

en_quotes.quote: The essence of mathematics lies in its freedom
en_quotes.author: Georg Cantor

en_quotes.quote: We have freedom of speech, and anybody's idea can't be a fact
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is just Chaos, with better lighting
en_quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

en_quotes.quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Those who profess to favor freedom, and yet depreciate agitation, are men who want crops without plowing up the ground
en_quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not an instantaneous holiday, as we once dreamed. It is a road. A long road. We know this now
en_quotes.author: Svetlana Alexievich

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is never dear at any price. It is the breath of life. What would a man not pay for living?
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is never granted; it is won
en_quotes.author: A. Philip Randolph

en_quotes.quote: Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: The secret of freedom lies in educating people, whereas the secret of tyranny is in keeping them ignorant
en_quotes.author: Maximilien Robespierre

en_quotes.quote: I loved the feeling of freedom in running, the fresh air, the feeling that the only person I'm competing with is me
en_quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is... not to be bound by my wounds. And to be able to eat cake every day
en_quotes.author: Amanda de Cadenet

en_quotes.quote: Mountains are freedom. Treat them respectfully
en_quotes.author: Conrad Anker

en_quotes.quote: When there is state there can be no freedom, but when there is freedom there will be no state
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

en_quotes.quote: So long as you do not achieve social liberty, whatever freedom is provided by the law is of no avail to you
en_quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

en_quotes.quote: The patriot's blood is the seed of Freedom's tree
en_quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Violent means will give violent freedom. That would be a menace to the world and to India herself
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not procured by a full enjoyment of what is desired, but by controlling the desire
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: The thing is this: You got to have fun while you're fightin' for freedom, 'cause you don't always win
en_quotes.author: Molly Ivins

en_quotes.quote: The best thing about being rich is the freedom; freedom to do whatever you want whenever you want. It doesn't suck
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lee

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: If I fall, I'll fall five feet four inches forward in the fight for freedom. I'm not backing off
en_quotes.author: Fannie Lou Hamer

en_quotes.quote: I want to give myself the freedom not to have to be projecting my whole life ahead
en_quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Emancipation from the bondage of the soil is no freedom for the tree
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: The more you practice, the better you get, the more freedom you have to create
en_quotes.author: Jocko Willink

en_quotes.quote: Freedom without rules doesn't work. And communities do not work unless they are regulated by etiquette
en_quotes.author: Judith Martin

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the recognition of necessity
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Engels

en_quotes.quote: We gain freedom when we have paid the full price
en_quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

en_quotes.quote: I made my own assessment of my life, and I began to live it. That was freedom
en_quotes.author: Fernando Flores

en_quotes.quote: A man may be a pessimistic determinist before lunch and an optimistic believer in the will's freedom after it
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Telling a story in a futuristic world gives you this freedom to explore things that bother you in contemporary times
en_quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

en_quotes.quote: There is no ageism or 'youthism' when it comes to freedom of speech. We are all citizens
en_quotes.author: Jacques Parizeau

en_quotes.quote: Veterans are a symbol of what makes our nation great, and we must never forget all they have done to ensure our freedom
en_quotes.author: Rodney Frelinghuysen

en_quotes.quote: I discovered freedom for the first time in England
en_quotes.author: Hirohito

en_quotes.quote: A person is a fool to become a writer. His only compensation is absolute freedom
en_quotes.author: Roald Dahl

en_quotes.quote: The American Dream is about freedom
en_quotes.author: Rick Mears

en_quotes.quote: One is a painter because one wants so-called freedom; one doesn't want to go to the office every morning
en_quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

en_quotes.quote: The road to freedom must be uphill, even if it is arduous and frustrating
en_quotes.author: Andrew Goodman

en_quotes.quote: I only ask to be free. The butterflies are free
en_quotes.author: Charles Dickens

en_quotes.quote: May we think of freedom, not as the right to do as we please, but as the opportunity to do what is right
en_quotes.author: Peter Marshall

en_quotes.quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: We know what works. Freedom Works. We know what's right. Freedom is right
en_quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: The American flag is the most recognized symbol of freedom and democracy in the world
en_quotes.author: Virginia Foxx

en_quotes.quote: I need to feel like I have that freedom to make mistakes and to just try things
en_quotes.author: Megan Rapinoe

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: We have freedom of speech, but you got to watch what you say
en_quotes.author: Tracy Morgan

en_quotes.quote: Liberty means responsibility. That is why most men dread it
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: The whole 'bad girl' thing allows me to mess up sometimes. And I have freedom to say more of what I want to
en_quotes.author: Ronda Rousey

en_quotes.quote: Free people, remember this maxim: we may acquire liberty, but it is never recovered if it is once lost
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: Freedom means the right of people to assemble, organize, and debate openly
en_quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

en_quotes.quote: You can only protect your liberties in this world by protecting the other man's freedom
en_quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

en_quotes.quote: Well, I'm a libertarian conservative, so I believe in limited government/maximum individual freedom
en_quotes.author: John Bolton

en_quotes.quote: Every dictator is an enemy of freedom, an opponent of law
en_quotes.author: Demosthenes

en_quotes.quote: I believe we are on an irreversible trend toward more freedom and democracy - but that could change
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom
en_quotes.author: Pythagoras

en_quotes.quote: Thought takes man out of servitude, into freedom
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Man will never be free until the last king is strangled with the entrails of the last priest
en_quotes.author: Denis Diderot

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as part freedom
en_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

en_quotes.quote: I was intelligent enough to make up my own mind. I not only had freedom of choice, I had freedom of expression
en_quotes.author: Amy Tan

en_quotes.quote: I believe in absolute freedom of expression. Everyone has a right to offend and be offended
en_quotes.author: Taslima Nasrin

en_quotes.quote: Whenever men take the law into their own hands, the loser is the law. And when the law loses, freedom languishes
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Rock and roll music - the music of freedom frightens people and unleashes all manner of conservative defense mechanisms
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: Netflix gives a lot of creative and artistic freedom to its actors and to its production team and whatnot
en_quotes.author: Madeline Brewer

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to live as we wish
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: I would welcome satirical references to political leaders as part of freedom of expression
en_quotes.author: Kapil Sibal

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the freedom to say that two plus two make four. If that is granted, all else follows
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to be a man to fight for freedom. All you have to do is to be an intelligent human being
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: My father always said, 'Malala will be free as a bird.'
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Human freedom involves our capacity to pause, to choose the one response toward which we wish to throw our weight
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: There can be no real freedom without the freedom to fail
en_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

en_quotes.quote: To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves
en_quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not of use to those who do not know how to employ it
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of conscience entails more dangers than authority and despotism
en_quotes.author: Michel Foucault

en_quotes.quote: Never wear your best trousers when you go out to fight for freedom and truth
en_quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

en_quotes.quote: Is freedom anything else than the right to live as we wish? Nothing else
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Enlightenment values of individual freedom are manifested best in individual acts of criticism and defiance
en_quotes.author: Pankaj Mishra

en_quotes.quote: Whenever regulation increases, personal freedom decreases
en_quotes.author: Alan Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Freedom believes in education - the salvation of slavery is ignorance
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is man's capacity to take a hand in his own development. It is our capacity to mold ourselves
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: Bastard Freedom waves Her fustian flag in mockery over slaves
en_quotes.author: Thomas Moore

en_quotes.quote: Freedom's just another word for nothing left to lose
en_quotes.author: Kris Kristofferson

en_quotes.quote: What's real freedom? Real freedom is being able to not have my way and still be just as happy as if I did
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: If we wish to free ourselves from enslavement, we must choose freedom and the responsibility this entails
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is control in your own life
en_quotes.author: Willie Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Freedom from fear' could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: I find only freedom in the realms of eccentricity
en_quotes.author: David Bowie

en_quotes.quote: Economic freedom cannot be sacrificed if political freedom is to be preserved
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: Human dignity is based upon freedom, and freedom upon human dignity. The one presupposes the other
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: The First Amendment freedom of religion is as important today as when the Bill of Rights was first written
en_quotes.author: Arlen Specter

en_quotes.quote: One certain effect of war is to diminish freedom of expression
en_quotes.author: Howard Zinn

en_quotes.quote: I believe in freedom of speech, but I believe we should also have the right to comment on freedom of speech
en_quotes.author: Stockwell Day

en_quotes.quote: Nothing changes the gender equation more significantly than women's economic freedom
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Liberation is not deliverance
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: I am part of a legacy of queer black women who have fought for the freedom of black people across the globe
en_quotes.author: Patrisse Cullors

en_quotes.quote: I can live without bread, but I can't live without freedom
en_quotes.author: Said Nursi

en_quotes.quote: I enjoy the freedom of the blank page
en_quotes.author: Irvine Welsh

en_quotes.quote: Routine is a declivity down which many governments slide, and routine says that freedom of the press is dangerous
en_quotes.author: Jose Rizal

en_quotes.quote: I believe firmly that in making ethical decisions, man has the prerogative of true freedom of choice
en_quotes.author: Corliss Lamont

en_quotes.quote: I've sold my soul for freedom. It's lonely but it's sweet
en_quotes.author: Melissa Etheridge

en_quotes.quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom
en_quotes.author: Christo

en_quotes.quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Paine

en_quotes.quote: I would like to be remembered as a person who wanted to be free... so other people would be also free
en_quotes.author: Rosa Parks

en_quotes.quote: The boisterous sea of liberty is never without a wave
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up
en_quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

en_quotes.quote: Oppressed people cannot remain oppressed forever. The yearning for freedom eventually manifests itself
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: If you're not ready to die for it, put the word 'freedom' out of your vocabulary
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: The search for human freedom can never be complete without freedom for women
en_quotes.author: Betty Ford

en_quotes.quote: I think we must get rid of slavery, or we must get rid of freedom
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Freedom from effort in the present merely means that there has been effort stored up in the past
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves; and under the rule of a just God, cannot long retain it
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: The revelation of thought takes men out of servitude into freedom
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: He only earns his freedom and his life Who takes them every day by storm
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Hero-worship is strongest where there is least regard for human freedom
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Order without liberty and liberty without order are equally destructive
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Most men today cannot conceive of a freedom that does not involve somebody's slavery
en_quotes.author: W. E. B. Du Bois

en_quotes.quote: The best way to enhance freedom in other lands is to demonstrate here that our democratic system is worthy of emulation
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: We have a beautiful right in this country, which is freedom of speech
en_quotes.author: Madeline Brewer

en_quotes.quote: The best road to progress is freedom's road
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: You measure a democracy by the freedom it gives its dissidents, not the freedom it gives its assimilated conformists
en_quotes.author: Abbie Hoffman

en_quotes.quote: Man is free at the moment he wishes to be
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is hammered out on the anvil of discussion, dissent, and debate
en_quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

en_quotes.quote: While the State exists there can be no freedom; when there is freedom there will be no State
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

en_quotes.quote: Analysis gave me great freedom of emotions and fantastic confidence. I felt I had served my time as a puppet
en_quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

en_quotes.quote: Freedom has cost too much blood and agony to be relinquished at the cheap price of rhetoric
en_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

en_quotes.quote: I have a place that I get to go to in the Bahamas. It's the only place that guarantees total anonymity and freedom
en_quotes.author: Johnny Depp

en_quotes.quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not civilization
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: I have tasted freedom. I will not give up that which I have tasted
en_quotes.author: Harvey Milk

en_quotes.quote: A nation which makes the final sacrifice for life and freedom does not get beaten
en_quotes.author: Mustafa Kemal Ataturk

en_quotes.quote: Being offended by freedom of speech should never be regarded as a justification for violence
en_quotes.author: Alan Dershowitz

en_quotes.quote: Enslave the liberty of but one human being and the liberties of the world are put in peril
en_quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

en_quotes.quote: The little black dress expresses a moment of freedom and individuality every time
en_quotes.author: Andre Leon Talley

en_quotes.quote: The only certain freedom's in departure
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Freedom - to walk free and own no superior
en_quotes.author: Walt Whitman

en_quotes.quote: If freedom makes social progress possible, so social progress strengthens and enlarges freedom
en_quotes.author: Robert Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is from within
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: When you're not concerned with succeeding, you can work with complete freedom
en_quotes.author: Larry David

en_quotes.quote: I know but one freedom, and that is the freedom of the mind
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: Pleasure and freedom from pain, are the only things desirable as ends
en_quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

en_quotes.quote: In America, through pressure of conformity, there is freedom of choice, but nothing to choose from
en_quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

en_quotes.quote: Exclusion is never the way forward on our shared paths to freedom and justice
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: The clash of ideas is the sound of freedom
en_quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom
en_quotes.author: Demi Moore

en_quotes.quote: If I have freedom in my love, And in my soul am free, - Angels alone that soar above, Enjoy such liberty
en_quotes.author: Richard Lovelace

en_quotes.quote: I have never been able to renounce the light, the pleasure of being, and the freedom in which I grew up
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Men are never really willing to die except for the sake of freedom: therefore they do not believe in dying completely
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Without freedom, no art; art lives only on the restraints it imposes on itself, and dies of all others
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: The fifth freedom is freedom from ignorance
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: None can love freedom heartily, but good men; the rest love not freedom, but licence
en_quotes.author: John Milton

en_quotes.quote: Every tyrant who has lived has believed in freedom for himself
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: I want to have freedom with everything I do
en_quotes.author: G-Dragon

en_quotes.quote: No nation could preserve its freedom in the midst of continual warfare
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: I think my first album opened a lot of doors for me to push the freedom of speech to the limit
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: We must be willing to pay a price for freedom
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: Freedom isn't to do what you want at somebody else's expense
en_quotes.author: John Lydon

en_quotes.quote: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices
en_quotes.author: Theodor W. Adorno

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul
en_quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

en_quotes.quote: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: A man is either free or he is not. There cannot be any apprenticeship for freedom
en_quotes.author: Amiri Baraka

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of expression is the matrix, the indispensable condition, of nearly every other form of freedom
en_quotes.author: Benjamin N. Cardozo

en_quotes.quote: The freedom to criticize judges and other public officials is necessary to a vibrant democracy
en_quotes.author: Sandra Day O'Connor

en_quotes.quote: Emergencies' have always been the pretext on which the safeguards of individual liberty have been eroded
en_quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

en_quotes.quote: Three simple words - freedom, justice and honesty. These sum up what the Liberal Democrats stand for
en_quotes.author: Charles Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: When we lose the right to be different, we lose the privilege to be free
en_quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

en_quotes.quote: Aesthetic freedom is like free speech; it is, indeed, a form of free speech
en_quotes.author: George Edward Woodberry

en_quotes.quote: You have freedom when you're easy in your harness
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Freedom in general may be defined as the absence of obstacles to the realization of desires
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: No amount of political freedom will satisfy the hungry masses
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Lenin

en_quotes.quote: I feel like my honesty gives people the freedom to talk about things they wouldn't otherwise
en_quotes.author: Jane Fonda

en_quotes.quote: Those who think of freedom in this country as one long, broad path leading ever onward and upward are dead damned wrong
en_quotes.author: Molly Ivins

en_quotes.quote: Freedom begins as we become conscious of it
en_quotes.author: Vernon Howard

en_quotes.quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization
en_quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

en_quotes.quote: I am the son of a freedom fighter, and a son of a freedom fighter automatically imbibes the value of democracy
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: Nothing that has value, real value, has no cost. Not freedom, not food, not shelter, not healthcare
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: Freedom means the freedom to be stupid, and that's what I want
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Freedom has never been free
en_quotes.author: Medgar Evers

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of expression is very important
en_quotes.author: Rodrigo Duterte

en_quotes.quote: Money's the cheapest thing. Liberty and freedom is the most expensive
en_quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

en_quotes.quote: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: The oppressed, having internalized the image of the oppressor and adopted his guidelines, are fearful of freedom
en_quotes.author: Paulo Freire

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a struggle, and we do it together. Not only together as black citizens, but black and white together
en_quotes.author: Andrew Young

en_quotes.quote: What is freedom? Freedom is the right to choose: the right to create for oneself the alternatives of choice
en_quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

en_quotes.quote: Liberty must be limited in order to be possessed
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: Freedom without limits is just a word
en_quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

en_quotes.quote: Real freedom is having nothing. I was freer when I didn't have a cent
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: America is a model of force and freedom and moderation - with all the coarseness and rudeness of its people
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a right ultimately defended by the sacrifice of America's servicemen and women
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Responsibility is the price of freedom
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Do not allow to slip away from you freedoms the people who came before you won with such hard knocks
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: It must be possible to solve the task of controlling nature and yet simultaneously create a new freedom
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it
en_quotes.author: Pericles

en_quotes.quote: Freedom does not die from frontal attack. It dies because men in power no longer believe in a system based upon liberty
en_quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

en_quotes.quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: A filmmaker has almost the same freedom as a novelist has when he buys himself some paper
en_quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is something that dies unless it's used
en_quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

en_quotes.quote: The greatest enemy of individual freedom is the individual himself
en_quotes.author: Saul Alinsky

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a man's natural power of doing what he pleases, so far as he is not prevented by force or law
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is a possession of inestimable value
en_quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

en_quotes.quote: Freedom across the world is a result of many individuals working together
en_quotes.author: Dan Gable

en_quotes.quote: I do celebrate anything with freedom in it, you know
en_quotes.author: Paul Mooney

en_quotes.quote: The desire for freedom and equilibrium (harmony) is inherent in man (due to the universal in him)
en_quotes.author: Piet Mondrian

en_quotes.quote: Jobs mean freedom for workers to support their families
en_quotes.author: Nancy Pelosi

en_quotes.quote: I take life as it happens. And I give myself a lot of freedom
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul Gaultier

en_quotes.quote: They were singing in French, but the melody was freedom and any American could understand that
en_quotes.author: Audie Murphy

en_quotes.quote: I took up arms for the freedom of my color. It is our own - we will defend it or perish
en_quotes.author: Toussaint Louverture

en_quotes.quote: Collectivism and freedom are mortal enemies. Only one will survive
en_quotes.author: G. Edward Griffin

en_quotes.quote: For us democracy is a question of human dignity. And human dignity is political freedom
en_quotes.author: Olof Palme

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not enough
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Be outrageous, ridicule the fraidy-cats, rejoice in all the oddities that freedom can produce
en_quotes.author: Molly Ivins

en_quotes.quote: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of a problem
en_quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

en_quotes.quote: People demand freedom only when they have no power
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: Men are freest when they are most unconscious of freedom. The shout is a rattling of chains, always was
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: There are two good things in life - freedom of thought and freedom of action
en_quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

en_quotes.quote: Wealth is a tool of freedom, but the pursuit of wealth is the way to slavery
en_quotes.author: Frank Herbert

en_quotes.quote: No protracted war can fail to endanger the freedom of a democratic country
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: Too much freedom can lead to the soul's decay
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: Freedom always deals with 'the possible'; this gives freedom its great flexibility, its fascination, and its dangers
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: I would describe and I have described myself to people who ask as a freedom fighter
en_quotes.author: Steven Biko

en_quotes.quote: I am not an Athenian or a Greek, but a citizen of the world
en_quotes.author: Diogenes

en_quotes.quote: Rock n' roll to me is all about freedom of thought and to be whatever you want to be
en_quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: I refuse to accept that the shackles of slavery can ever be stronger than the quest for freedom
en_quotes.author: Kailash Satyarthi

en_quotes.quote: Fashion is an imposition, a reign on freedom
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: It is harder to preserve than to obtain liberty
en_quotes.author: John C. Calhoun

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not the absence of obligation or restraint, but the freedom of movement within healthy, chosen parameters
en_quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

en_quotes.quote: For a man of my generation, our century has been a long intellectual and political struggle in favor of freedom
en_quotes.author: Octavio Paz

en_quotes.quote: If our freedom is taken, the American dream will wither and die
en_quotes.author: Rand Paul

en_quotes.quote: If they want to hang me, let them. And on the scaffold I will shout Freedom for the working class!
en_quotes.author: Mary Harris Jones

en_quotes.quote: Secrecy is the freedom tyrants dream of
en_quotes.author: Bill Moyers

en_quotes.quote: In a completely sane world, madness is the only freedom
en_quotes.author: J. G. Ballard

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is living without chains
en_quotes.author: Indra Devi

en_quotes.quote: You don't have true freedom until you allow a diversity of opinion and a diversity of voices
en_quotes.author: Don Lemon

en_quotes.quote: I have a free voice. I have a free mind. I have freedom of expression
en_quotes.author: Larry Wilmore

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is relative
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: War - hard apprenticeship of freedom
en_quotes.author: Edward Everett Hale

en_quotes.quote: Freedom rings where opinions clash
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: But I found that disappointing people is a good thing, because disapproval is freedom
en_quotes.author: Demetri Martin

en_quotes.quote: If one is going to err, one should err on the side of liberty and freedom
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: All theory is against freedom of the will; all experience for it
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty
en_quotes.author: Frank Herbert

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a little freedom. Either you are all free, or you are not free
en_quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

en_quotes.quote: Freedom cannot be given... It can only be taken away
en_quotes.author: David Allan Coe

en_quotes.quote: Humanity has won its battle. Liberty now has a country
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Lafayette

en_quotes.quote: You cannot parcel out freedom in pieces because freedom is all or nothing
en_quotes.author: Tertullian

en_quotes.quote: No man is good enough to be another's master
en_quotes.author: William Morris

en_quotes.quote: A threat to our freedom is a threat to our freedom, whether from a terrorist or from a trade deal
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: I suffered evils, but without allowing them to rob me of the freedom to expand
en_quotes.author: Gordon Parks

en_quotes.quote: Freedom granted only when it is known beforehand that its effects will be beneficial is not freedom
en_quotes.author: Friedrich August von Hayek

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of the press is not an end in itself but a means to the end of achieving a free society
en_quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

en_quotes.quote: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen
en_quotes.author: Warren E. Burger

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the by-product of economic surplus
en_quotes.author: Aneurin Bevan

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is not worth fighting for if it means no more than license for everyone to get as much as he can for himself
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

en_quotes.quote: We who officially value freedom of speech above life itself seem to have nothing to talk about but the weather
en_quotes.author: Barbara Ehrenreich

en_quotes.quote: We hold our heads high, despite the price we have paid, because freedom is priceless
en_quotes.author: Lech Walesa

en_quotes.quote: Socialism and freedom are not compatible, regardless of repeated convincings
en_quotes.author: Alija Izetbegovic

en_quotes.quote: America's commitment to religious freedom and tolerance should not be conditional
en_quotes.author: Mark McKinnon

en_quotes.quote: Whether in chains or in laurels, liberty knows nothing but victories
en_quotes.author: Wendell Phillips

en_quotes.quote: Your determination, selflessness and courage have brought the freedom struggle towards its fulfilment
en_quotes.author: Gerry Adams

en_quotes.quote: You don't just end up with freedom when you have the vote. The struggle continues
en_quotes.author: Jacob Zuma

en_quotes.quote: The liberty of the individual is a necessary postulate of human progress
en_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

en_quotes.quote: Coercion, after all, merely captures man. Freedom captivates him
en_quotes.author: Robert McNamara

en_quotes.quote: I believe in full freedom for Christians of all denominations
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Zhirinovsky

en_quotes.quote: If you don't mind haunting the margins, I think there is more freedom there
en_quotes.author: Colin Firth

en_quotes.quote: While people can differ on the issues, no one should seek to discourage freedom of speech
en_quotes.author: Stan Van Gundy

en_quotes.quote: I can remember when Democrats believed that it was the duty of America to fight for freedom over tyranny
en_quotes.author: Zell Miller

en_quotes.quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: I think I have a right to live my life the way I like
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended
en_quotes.author: George W. Bush

en_quotes.quote: A hungry man is not a free man
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: The more liberty you give away the more you will have
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is absolutely necessary for the progress in science and the liberal arts
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: There's a freedom to being young that is harder to come by as time goes on
en_quotes.author: Dave Matthews

en_quotes.quote: Liberty is worth paying for
en_quotes.author: Jules Verne

en_quotes.quote: Look how long it took to build the Freedom Tower, and we wanted that. It took 15 years
en_quotes.author: Bill Burr

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the only law which genius knows
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: They call them terrorists, I call them freedom fighters
en_quotes.author: Louis Farrakhan

en_quotes.quote: I need this wild life, this freedom
en_quotes.author: Zane Grey

en_quotes.quote: We do not commonly see in a tax a diminution of freedom, and yet it clearly is one
en_quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

en_quotes.quote: You can only be free if I am free
en_quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

en_quotes.quote: Heresy is another word for freedom of thought
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: I think there was a freedom in the 1920s and 1930s: a certain liberty and evolution of women
en_quotes.author: Francois Nars

en_quotes.quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms
en_quotes.author: William O. Douglas

en_quotes.quote: To silence criticism is to silence freedom
en_quotes.author: Sidney Hook

en_quotes.quote: I support liberty; I support true freedom
en_quotes.author: David Draiman

en_quotes.quote: Wanting to be a rock star, I get it. I'm like, 'Oh, my God, dude! The freedom!'
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: The more decisions that you are forced to make alone, the more you are aware of your freedom to choose
en_quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is contagious. That's why despots fear it so much
en_quotes.author: Bill Owens

en_quotes.quote: Liberty is not a means to a higher political end. It is itself the highest political end
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: Liberty is not the power of doing what we like, but the right to do what we ought
en_quotes.author: John Dalberg-Acton

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to one's dignity as a man
en_quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

en_quotes.quote: Freedom - an occupied space which must be reoccupied every day
en_quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

en_quotes.quote: If liberty has any meaning it means freedom to improve
en_quotes.author: Philip Wylie

en_quotes.quote: Human beings crave freedom at their core
en_quotes.author: John Ensign

en_quotes.quote: Free men are the strongest men
en_quotes.author: Wendell Willkie

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big advocate of freedom: freedom of speech, freedom of expression, freedom of thought
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Wales

en_quotes.quote: We should favor innovation and freedom over regulation
en_quotes.author: George Allen

en_quotes.quote: One of the unsung freedoms that go with a free press is the freedom not to read it
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Mount

en_quotes.quote: The very idea of freedom incites fear in the hearts of terrorists across the world
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Dole

en_quotes.quote: Freedom is never easily won, but once established, freedom lasts, spreads and chokes out tyranny
en_quotes.author: Trent Lott

en_quotes.quote: The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom
en_quotes.author: Silvio Berlusconi
